element.name: Display
element.description: Dummy element used to define certain SWT system colors.

property.name: rwt-shadow-color
property.description: Color used to draw (outer) shadow line in 3d borders. Defines the value of SWT.COLOR_WIDGET_NORMAL_SHADOW.

property.name: rwt-highlight-color
property.description: Color used to draw (outer) highlight line in 3d borders. Defines the value of SWT.COLOR_WIDGET_HIGHLIGHT_SHADOW.

property.name: rwt-darkshadow-color
property.description: Color used to draw (inner) shadow line in 3d borders. Defines the value of SWT.COLOR_WIDGET_DARK_SHADOW.

property.name: rwt-lightshadow-color
property.description: Color used to draw (inner) highlight line in 3d borders. Defines the value of SWT.COLOR_WIDGET_LIGHT_SHADOW.

property.name: rwt-thinborder-color
property.description: Color for thin lines as shown by Group, TabFolder headers, Table headers, etc. Defines the value of SWT.COLOR_WIDGET_BORDER.

property.name: rwt-selectionmarker-color
property.description: Color used to mark selected items like TreeColumns and TabViews.

property.name: rwt-error-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT.ICON_ERROR. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-information-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT.ICON_INFORMATION. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-working-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT.ICON_WORKING. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-question-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT.ICON_QUESTION. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

property.name: rwt-warning-image
property.description: The image used for MessageBoxes with style SWT.ICON_WARNING. Also returned by Display#getSystemImage().

element.name: ToolTip
element.description: Tooltips on SWT widgets, as set using setTooltipText().
